title: The in-game menu (spacebar) is like twice as big as it used to be and I can't see the actual game
body: So my settings won't game, so every single game I have to make the changes all over again manually. With the new patch, the menu is way too big now and there's no setting to make it smaller. I don't know if this was intended or not, but it's really annoying to not be able to see what's happening in-game because of it

replies.body:
It sounds like you might have a corrupt config, especially if the servers aren't able to pick up your settings to save.  Resetting your config should fix this all up.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if this works for you!
My setting stay saved now! Thanks a bunch!
